title: Natural Language Interaction for Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to use natural language to request and verify health metrics from ALFRED so that I can ensure accurate monitoring and address any anomalies without causing unnecessary alarm to my clients.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Alerts
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to receive alerts for abnormal health readings so that I can verify the results and ensure timely intervention for my clients without causing unnecessary stress.

title: Seamless Communication Channels – Video Calling Capabilities
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to easily initiate video calls with my clients using ALFRED so that I can maintain clear communication with them and their families in a way that feels personal and supportive.

title: Simplified User Interface for Client Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a simplified user interface that allows me to quickly access and monitor the health status of multiple clients so that I can efficiently manage their care without the risk of miscommunication or confusion.

title: Privacy-Respecting Data Access – User-Controlled Consent for Data Sharing
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to control the data shared with family members and healthcare providers so that I can ensure my clients' privacy and comfort is respected while maintaining effective communication.

title: Task Management Support - Reminders for Caregiving Tasks
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive context-sensitive reminders for caregiving tasks so that I can efficiently manage appointments and care schedules without overwhelming my clients with unnecessary alerts.

title: Feedback Mechanisms for Improvement – Reporting Tools for Caregiver Experiences
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to provide feedback on my experiences using ALFRED so that the system can improve and better meet the needs of clients and caregivers alike.
